1. Mayor & City Council

Mayor & City Council
====================

* Third Tuesday of each month
* City Council Chambers
  200 N Bell Street
  Willis, TX 77378

The City of Willis operates under a City Council/City Manager form of government. Citizens are represented on the City Council by 6 elected members - The Mayor and 5 City Council Members.

[William Brown, Mayor](https://www.ci.willis.tx.us/Directory.aspx?EID=10)

[Ashley Nixon, Council Member Number 1](http://ci.willis.tx.us/directory.aspx?EID=22)

[Barney Stone, Council Member Number 2](https://www.ci.willis.tx.us/directory.aspx?EID=7)

[Thomas Belinoski, Council Member Number 3](http://ci.willis.tx.us/directory.aspx?EID=8)

[Thomas Luster, Council Member Number 4](https://www.ci.willis.tx.us/directory.aspx?EID=9 "Tom Luster")

[Kaye Maglitto, Council Member Number 5](https://www.ci.willis.tx.us/gallery.aspx?PID=23)
